channel.title: tor speed issue (im gona crazy)
channel.description:
hi. i dont know what i should to do. my VM mahcines have extra slow tor connection.
i can 10 times restart tor servise on gateway, but f@cking speed stays around 0.1-0.3 mbs (exxxtra slow)
but some times tor going fast like 3+ mbs and it is not about tor server cuz when i restart tor servise and change server thespeed dont changes.
so my question: what the fuck is this? :(
ps. i have good speed on my host
